definition: unreasonable/shocking/outrageous/also written 不像話|不像话
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.chinese: 這次考試容易得不象話。

sentences.english: Floor master is not like words, how can you post such thread .
sentences.chinese: 樓主不象話，怎麼能發這種帖？

sentences.english: It's a shame John eats sweets whenever he gets the chance.
sentences.chinese: 約翰只要有機會就喫糖，真不象話。

sentences.english: It would be ungracious of me to give you less than he gave me.
sentences.chinese: 如果我給你的比他給我的少，那就太不象話了。

sentences.english: It is immoral that a mattress should have so much power.
sentences.chinese: 這很不象話，一個牀墊有這麼大的威力。

sentences.english: It was indecent of them to talk business at the funeral.
sentences.chinese: 他們在葬禮上談生意經，真不象話。

sentences.english: You have some nerve thinking I went out with another guy.
sentences.chinese: 太不象話了，你竟然認爲我同另外一個男孩子出去了。

sentences.english: That little boy has some nerve quarrelling with his teacher.
sentences.chinese: 那個小男孩太不象話，竟然和他的老師吵架。
